about_the_game:
Play as the Archangel Raphael in your quest to save the girl Sarah from Asmodeus's castle! Can you defeat the hordes of demons in this giant castle and save Sarah before it's too late? To do this, you need to travel 13 giant floors of demon communities to slaughter them all and to get to the top where Sarah is in this action-packed, first-person dungeon crawler.

You are alone in this fight, but fear not! YHVH has granted you multiple actions per turn! Combat is mostly done with the TP or meter system; larger attacks and defensive moves require lots of TP while weaker skills require less TP. It is easy to learn but hard to master.

  • Master the meter combat system!

  • Take on loads of demon side quests to get new armor, weapons, and skills!

  • fully customize Raphael by selecting his unique skills, bonus stats and more!

  • travel the 13 floors and discover all the hidden secrets!

  • Fight against 135 unique enemies and bosses!

  • 7-10 hours worth of gameplay.

This journey is a hard one, but if you look at your environment carefully and help people out, you will make it through this just fine! But you are skilled enough to do so?

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the demons can be considered nude.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: I3-2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intergrated
  • Storage: 460 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any will do
  • Additional Notes: Settings can be changed, but on lower hadrware, things will not render correctly
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 4300G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Graphics
  • Storage: 460 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any will do

short_description: In this Metroidvania-inspired first person dungeon crawler, play as Raphael, climbing the 13 unique floors to get to the top. Manage your stamina in combat, fight off demons, do side quests, get stronger and gather more weapons to save Sarah from Asmodeus at the top.
